dictionary.beginners_ordinary_people_professionals_: We help beginners and ordinary people earn like professional traders
dictionary.mind_business_smart_yoko_robot_everythin: Mind your own business, smart Yoko robot will do everything for you
dictionary.robot_nalyzes_charts_selects_successful_: The robot itself analyzes the charts and selects successful coins for trading.
dictionary.knows_buy_sell_closes_profitable_trades: He knows where to buy and sell. Closes only profitable trades.
dictionary.robot_not_need_sleep_works_monitors_situ: The robot does not need sleep or rest, it works and monitors the market situation without breaks and days off while you rest
dictionary.your_money_your_money_your_stored_exchan: Your money is only your money! Your funds are stored on the exchange and only you have access to them. The robot cannot deposit or withdraw money, it can only open and close trades.
dictionary.we_work_largest_exchanges: We work with the largest exchanges
dictionary.we_connect_robot_absolutely_charge._subs: We connect the robot absolutely free of charge. No subscription fee. We only take % of your profits earned while trading with our Yoko robot. When you first connect, the profit percentage will be calculated after the trial period, so you have 14 days to test the Yoko robot completely free of charge. Further, you will only need to pay a percentage of the earned profit. Our profit depends on yours.
dictionary.percentage_profit_calculated_size_deposi: the percentage of profit is calculated based on the size of your deposit and the trading period, more details are indicated in your personal account
dictionary.last_closed_deals_Yoko_robot: Last closed deals by Yoko robot
dictionary.keep_track_latest_robot_trades: Keep track of the latest robot trades
dictionary.everything_become_simple_understandable: everything will become simple and understandable
dictionary.connect_robot_easy_steps: Connect your robot in 4 easy steps
dictionary.register_website_get_personal_account: Register on our website and get a personal account
dictionary.account_exchange_register_referral_bonus: If you do not have an account on the exchange yet, you can register it using our referral link and get a bonus
dictionary.receive_detailed_instructions_connecting: You will receive detailed instructions for connecting the robot to your account on the exchange
dictionary.robot_trades_follow_transactions_persona: Now the robot trades, and you follow the transactions in your personal account and earn
dictionary.keep_track_transactions_convenient_perso: Keep track of your transactions in a convenient personal account
dictionary.follow_full_statistics_trading_device_wh: Follow the full statistics of trading with Yoko robot from any device and wherever you are.
dictionary.your_goal_profit_will_help_this: Your goal is profit, and we will help you with this
dictionary.combined_trading_strategies_trading_comb: We have combined two of the best trading strategies in one. Smart averaging trading combined with the best pump analysis on the market. All this together allows you to trade with maximum efficiency. Learn more about the strategy.
dictionary.robot_simultaneously_unlimited_automatic: The robot can trade simultaneously with an unlimited number of coins and automatically switch between trading pairs.
dictionary.capabilities_control_panel_trading_setti: We have increased your capabilities and added more than 30 trading settings to the robot control panel, which will allow you to trade effectively in any market behavior. We have also added ready-made settings templates individually for the size of your deposit. Customize your Yoko robot and improve your trading.
dictionary.connect_telegram_account_notify_transact: Connect the telegram bot to your account and it will notify you every time about new deals.
dictionary.personal_account_simulation_mode_deposit: Now in your personal account you can turn on the trading simulation mode and check how the robot would have traded with your deposit for the last 60 days, and find out how much you would have earned if you traded this period with the Yoko robot.
dictionary.affiliate_program_profit_commission_with: Join our affiliate program and earn 30% of our profit commission for every user you refer. Quickly withdraws your percentage from each referral to your crypto wallet.
dictionary.example_riviews: Suddenly, the conclusions made on the basis of Internet analytics to this day remain the lot of liberals who are eager to be declared violating the universal norms of ethics and morality. Modern technologies have reached such a level that understanding the essence of resource-saving technologies creates the need to include a number of extraordinary events in the production plan.
dictionary.best_cryptocurrency_trading: The Best Cryptocurrency Trading Bots in 2022
dictionary.cryptocurrency_changing_market _change_r: Cryptocurrency is a rapidly changing market, so information about trading bots changes frequently. Prices change, features are added, and ratings change. We've made three major changes to this version of our article:
